availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: P. G. Reese (Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer & Col 45th Reg KY Militia)

body.p: Grayson County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Married to Sallie A. Reese. Father of S. F. Reese and Lillie A. A. Reese. Colonel of the 45th Regiment of Kentucky Militia (U.S.A.) in Grayson County in 1863 and 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Grayson County, Leitchfield Precinct, p. 81.
W. Stephen McBride, “The Union Occupation of Munfordville, Kentucky, 1861-1865: A Narrative Summary,” (Lexington, Kentucky), 46-47.
